                Give a Gift
    Update Your InformationCurrent page:  UA
                                        
    		University Advancement
    	Our CommitmentUniversity Advancement is dedicated to engaging alumni, parents, and the community in The Chico Experience. We believe that Chico State offers students a unique educational environment that celebrates academic achievement, learning beyond the classroom, and a commitment to civic engagement.We invite you to join us in strengthening our University for future generations by investing in the people and programs that impact the future of our campus and our students.Why Your Support MattersTuition and state support do not cover the cost of a Chico State education. Increasingly, the University depends on private gifts.Learn how your support can make an impact.The University FoundationThe University Foundation stewards gifts and endowments that support Chico State's outstanding reputation for academic achievement, civic engagement, and sustainability. It is overseen by a governing board comprised of volunteers and campus leaders.University AdvancementVice President Ahmad BouraKendall Hall, Room 114530-898-3590www.csuchico.edu/advancementSupport Chico StateDepartmentsAdvancement ServicesAlumni & Parent EngagementUniversity CommunicationsUniversity DevelopmentUniversity Public EngagementChico Performances(opens in new window)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
